House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08022
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR BUSINESS-FRIENDLY TAX REMEDIES IN LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS BY AMENDING CERTAIN PROVISIONS IN BOOK II OF REPUBLIC ACT 7160, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT CODE OF 1991
ABSTRACT : Provides for the procedure for the approval and effectivity of tax ordinances and revenue measures; and the proceedings required in holding mandatory public hearings. Aims to provide additional measures to ensure the observance of procedural due process in the exercise of remedies for taxpayers, particularly in disputing tax assessments and in filing of claims for refund.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-08-06
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
